channel.title: Padlocks?
channel.description:
So, what I wan't is. When you click this specific NPC (Vannaka), you get certain items. Then, if you have those items he won't give you them again. What do I add this under? E.G, if you wan't an object to do that, you'd add it underneath
[code]OBJECT CLICK ONE[/code]
Thanks. Also, Ikiliki, if you're still here could you tell me? You had Santa do it on you're server. If you're still in this section. :|
Got it myself, thanks anyway.
